LOGIN.CLIENT_ASSISTANCE: If you require any assistance, please contact us at clientsupport@moneyowl.com.sg or 6329 9188. Our operating hours are Monday - Friday, 9am - 6pm.

SINGPASS_ACTIVATE_MODAL.TITLE: Log In to MoneyOwl using Singpass Mobile App
SINGPASS_ACTIVATE_MODAL.MESSAGE:
If you do not have a MoneyOwl investment account, please do a Password Login and activate Singpass Login in your Profile page.

If you have a MoneyOwl investment account, simply scan the QR code with your Singpass Mobile App to log in!

Please note that this feature is available to all Singpass Registered Users.

Learn more about Singpass

SINGPASS_LOGIN_FAIL_MODAL.TITLE: Singpass login unsuccessful
SINGPASS_LOGIN_FAIL_MODAL.MESSAGE:
If you have a MoneyOwl account, please do a Password Login and activate Singpass Login in your Profile page.

If you do not have a MoneyOwl account, click here to create an account.

FORGOTPASSWORD.CHECK_EMAIL: Please check your email for a link to reset your password. If you do not receive it, check your spam folder.
FORGOTPASSWORD.CHECK_VERIFY_EMAIL: A verification link has been sent to your email address. Please verify your email address before logging in.
FORGOTPASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: Enter your email to receive your password reset instructions.
FORGOTPASSWORD.TITLE: Forgot Password
FORGOTPASSWORD.EMAIL_NOT_FOUND_DESC: The email you’ve entered doesn’t seem to exist in our database. Please try again.
FORGOTPASSWORD.EMAIL_RESEND: To proceed, please verify your email address. A new email verification link is sent to your email address.

PRELOGIN.TITLE: Are you an existing MoneyOwl user?

ERROR.POSTAL_CODE_DESC: Online Retrieval is not successful due to network issue or host down.

UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.TITLE: Upload Documents
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.PAGE_SUB_CAPTION: Help us verify your identity and prevent fraud.
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.PROOF_OF_MAILING_SUBTEXT: This document must match the information provided under "Mailing Address" earlier.
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.PROOF_OF_RESIDENT_SUBTEXT: This document must match the information provided under "Residential Address" earlier.
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.SPECIFICATION: Specifications for documents to be uploaded:
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.SUPPORTED_FILES: pdf, jpg, jpeg, png, gif, bmp

MAILING_ADDRESS_PROOF.TITLE: Proof Of Mailing Address
MAILING_ADDRESS_PROOF.MESSAGE:
This document must be from a billing organisation and clearly display your name, current mailing address and be dated no more than 90 days prior to today’s date.

You may use utility bills, phone bills, credit card bills etc.

RES_ADDRESS_PROOF.TITLE: Proof Of Residential Address
RES_ADDRESS_PROOF.MESSAGE:
This document must be from a billing organisation and clearly display your name, current residential address and be dated no more than 90 days prior to today’s date.

You may use utility bills, phone bills, credit card bills etc.

UPLOAD_LATER.TITLE: Upload Documents Later?
UPLOAD_LATER.MESSAGE:
You may save your progress and log in later to upload your verification documents. However, this will delay the set up of your investment account.

Would you like to continue?

UPLOADING_LOADER.TITLE: Uploading
UPLOADING_LOADER.MESSAGE: Please be patient, upload may take a few minutes.

FILE_SIZE_EXCEEDED.TITLE: Error !
FILE_SIZE_EXCEEDED.MESSAGE: File of size more than 10 MB is not allowed.

FILE_TYPE_MISMATCH.TITLE: Error !
FILE_TYPE_MISMATCH.MESSAGE: The selected file type is not allowed.

INVESTMENT.CASH_ACCOUNT_BALANCE_MESSAGE: The cash account is where all your investment funds are held before it is transferred to a portfolio or your bank account.
INVESTMENT.SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE: Sorry, this service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

SRS_JOINT_ACCOUNT_SLIDES.TITLE: New Updates
SRS_JOINT_ACCOUNT_SLIDES.TEXT: Kick off your passive income journey with WiseIncome with no lock-in period! You also get the flexibility to choose your payout option.

SRS_JOINT_ACCOUNT_SLIDES.IMG_TITLE: You can now open your SRS Investment Account online!
SRS_JOINT_ACCOUNT_SLIDES.TEXT: Invest your Supplementary Retirement Scheme (SRS) savings to get potentially higher returns while enjoying tax savings.

SRS_JOINT_ACCOUNT_SLIDES.TITLE: New Updates
SRS_JOINT_ACCOUNT_SLIDES.TEXT: Apply for a Joint Investment Account with your loved ones today and enjoy all the good things that come in pairs.

MYINFO_CONFIRM.TITLE: Retrieve Myinfo with Singpass
MYINFO_CONFIRM.DESCRIPTION:
Applicable to all Singpass Registered users.

You will now proceed to login via Myinfo and retrieve your following details. Please use your own account only.
Name
NRIC/FIN

Would you like to proceed?

FETCH_MODAL_DATA.TITLE: Linking Account…
FETCH_MODAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION: Please be patient while we are linking up your MoneyOwl account.

LOADER2.message: Sorry that it is taking longer than expected. We are still trying to link up your MoneyOwl account.

ERROR_MODAL.TITLE: Oops, Unable to Connect
ERROR_MODAL.MESSAGE: We are unable to connect to Myinfo temporarily. Please try again later.

ALREADY_EXISTING.TITLE: Unable to proceed with the NRIC/FIN
ALREADY_EXISTING.DESC:
We have detected that the NRIC/FIN is already in use by another account. Please use your own account only.

Contact us at enquiries@moneyowl.com.sg if you require any assistance.

DIFFERENT_USER.TITLE: Unable to proceed with the NRIC/FIN
DIFFERENT_USER.DESC:
We have detected that the NRIC/FIN used is different from your account. Please use your own account only.

Contact us at enquiries@moneyowl.com.sg if you require any assistance.
